## SessionDelegate.onMessage() method

Called upon receiving an incoming in dialog MESSAGE request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | <code>Message</code> | The message. |
